title: HTML+CSS Level 1 â€” Basic HTML Structure
intro: This level introduces the basic structure of an HTML document and simple text content.
points: Understand the basic HTML skeleton: <!DOCTYPE html>, <html>, <head>, <body>.
Know the purpose of <title> and how it appears in the browser tab.
Use headings <h1> to <h6> for titles and subtitles.
Open and close tags correctly and indent code for readability.
